title: Get a jump on Black Friday with this wireless car display, now under $90
content:
Macworld

If you or a loved one are sick of squinting at your phone to get directions, a larger display can help. This 7″ wireless display tucks neatly on your dash or windshield while using your preferred auto system or mirroring your phone. You don’t have to wait for Black Friday or the holiday frenzy to score this accessory, either. It’s now only $89.97 (reg. $139) through November 9th!

This wireless infotainment display can be easily installed on any smooth surface with its suction cup bracket or windshield with its windshield lock, making it compatible with most vehicle models. It’s also compatible with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, or can be connected to your smartphone with Bluetooth.

Voice control lets you stay hands-free when making calls, texting, playing music, or using navigation apps like Google Maps or Apple Maps. Meanwhile, an auxiliary connection enables you to jack audio from your dashboard CD player or tape deck. All this can be viewed on the display’s intuitive HD touchscreen interface, which has 1024×600 resolution and supports 1920x1080p and most video and audio file formats.

This holiday season, give yourself or a loved one the gift of a hands-free driving experience.

Upgrade any car with this 7″ Wireless Car Display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Compatibility, now just $89.97 with no coupon necessary. This offer ends November 9th at 11:59pm Pacific!
